description:
The Warrior of the Ox, Ushii, is seen by other fighters as "incomprehensibly powerful." The genius combatant uses his systematic killing style to see his own righteousness fulfilled on battlefields, and to slaughter any enemy he comes across. But once, on one battlefield, this same "Genius of Slaughter" saved a girl...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito no Umafubuki de Houji Suru
Labourer son champ avec le bœuf d’un autre
To Treat a Man to Beef from His Own Cow
